QuestData.Title: Unseen Influence
QuestData.Description: The corruption in the Apexis has begun to affect many of my people. We are so accustomed to the power it grants us that more succumb to the whispers every day. You must bring me more samples so I can free my people from yet another curse.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect $oa Fel-Corrupted Apexis Fragments from any Treasure or from any Rare or Rare Elite creature in Tanaan Jungle.
QuestData.CompletionText: I fear even your help may not be enough to avert the doom of the Arakkoa.
QuestData.RewardText: I will continue to need your help until this world is free of whatever terrible presence Gul'dan has invited to destroy us.
